file_content.text: Invalid orders. Cannot report; motor and combat systems nonfunctional. System error imminent.
System error. System error.
Please access the control console. Please go quickly.
Authorization. Authorization? System cannot identify. Please don't go.
Please don't go. What's happening? Are you with Lord Grathan? Are you invading? System cannot identify.
I'm here on my own. Lord Grathan is an enemy.
I'm not with Grathan.
Then who--
I'm here for the people Grathan kidnapped.
Where are the soldiers?
I am--I am a soldier. I am a--
You're awfully emotional for a heap of machinery.
Crazy droid.
You don't--I am not a machine. I'm not a droid. I--
System cannot--stop! Reassigning priorities.
I'm Ensign Tholver Shan, Imperial Military Operating Number 218A697. Please--did the Duchess send you? Please help me.
Your commander sent me to free you and the others.
I talked to the Duchess.
We failed her. Failed to defend ourselves.
How can this be?
Something's wrong with your programming, droid.
You're broken.
Running diagnostic. Stop! The programming is unfinished--please don't issue commands. It hurts so much.
Grathan's people--took us prisoner for experiments. The scientists cut open our heads, put us in droids. Identification: Model OHK-99.
They program us for advanced intelligence. Enhanced combat tactics. Now my body's lying dead across the room--I can see it.
Are the rest of the soldiers still alive?
What about the others?
Can't I assist?
This mad science is nothing next to the Force.
Pitiful experiments.
Then destroy it. Destroy this technology.
You're a slave now--as I was, not so long ago.
I lost my freedom, once.
Yes. That's accurate. Please undo it.
This technology should belong to the Imperial Army.
Smart droids sound useful.
No one should be allowed to do this. No one deserves this.
No droid, advanced or not, is a match for a good bounty hunter.
Smart droids aren't so great.
Analyzing. Running tactical program. Stop!
I'm the last--the others have all been converted. They can't talk. Can't disobey. But I know they can still think. Feel.
Please listen. You could disable us all--send the shutdown command from our central command console. Please--you could put an end to this.
If I shut you down--you wouldn't survive, would you? You'd die.
"Disable"? You mean "kill."
Core overload and shutdown. There's--we're not human anymore. There's nothing left to kill.
I'm here to send you home, not to shut you down.
I came to bring you back.
No. No!
What other commands could I send from the console?
Could I control you?
System cannot identify user. Accepting low-level commands only; all combat functionality denied.
The Duchess, the military--they might be able to command us. We're programmed to obey our masters. But we can't go back. We shouldn't exist.
Use the command console. I can't go with you--motor and combat systems nonfunctional. Please make it stop hurting.
Wait here. This'll all be over soon.
I'll finish this.
Seize the anguish while you're still able. It's all you have left.
Savor the pain.
Please. Please go.
You'll find out what I've decided to do soon enough.
Your fate's in my hands. Fun.
You've done good work for the Empire. You'll be remembered.
You're a fine soldier.
Thank you. Go.
I wasn't paid to deal with this. I'll see what I can do.
These jobs are a pain.
I understand. Go.
It's all over now. The pain will stop.
Time to rest. [Disable droid]
System error. System error. System error. System error.
Unauthorized user.
